1.1.2. altimetry.tools ModuleÂ¶

This module contain a number of tools for processing the data.

These are :

  • 1.1.2.1. Spectral analysis
    • 1.1.2.1.1. About spectral analysis
    • 1.1.2.1.2. List of useful functions
    • 1.1.2.1.3. Functions
  • 1.1.2.2. NetCDF tools
    • 1.1.2.2.1. An easy to use wrapper to NetCDF4 package - altimetry.tools.nctools.nc
    • 1.1.2.2.2. Addionnal function
